Some intersting links regarding styles and stuff

CSS minute

  • Complete guilde to background images in email Learn everything you need to know to use background images in HTML email campaigns—from design to coding—with plenty of examples for inspiration.
  • Css grid in production CSS Grid is one of the biggest enhancements for layouts the web has seen in a long time. We are finally able to create native two-dimensional layouts—even for older browsers like IE11.
  • w descriptors and sizes: Under the hood Discover insights faster and communicate more effectively with interactive notebooks for data analysis, visualization, and exploration.
  • display: contents What happens when you use display: contents?
  • Working with the new CSS Typed Object Model CSS Typed Object Model (Typed OM) brings types, methods, and a flexible object model to working with CSS values. Shipped in Chrome 66.
